title: Next Week on Xbox: New Games for June 2 to 6
description: The post Next Week on Xbox: New Games for June 2 to 6 appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Mike Nelson, Xbox Wire Editor
categories: Next Week on Xbox: June 2 to 6
SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia In The Americas
excerpt: Next Week on Xbox - Zenless Zone Zero, Splitgate 2, Tour de France 2025, Narcissus, Forest Golf Planner, and more coming soon!
text: Welcome to Next Week on Xbox! In this weekly feature we cover all the games coming soon to Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Xbox PC, and Game Pass! Get more details on these upcoming games below and click their profiles for further info (release dates subject to change). Let’s jump in! Zenless Zone Zero Zenless Zone Zero – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S Zenless Zone Zero is HoYoverse’s brand-new urban fantasy ARPG. Step into the shoes of a Proxy, a professional specialized in navigating the dangerous Hollows, guiding those who, for various reasons, need to venture inside. You will embark on an adventure with unique characters to explore Hollows, battle formidable enemies, complete commissions, and learn about the mysteries behind the city. Pick up the Zenless Zone Sero Starter Pack here. Splitgate 2 Splitgate 2 – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery / Xbox Play Anywhere Portal into the action as an elite Ace in Splitgate 2, the only free-to-play shooter where you can teleport across the map to outsmart your opponents. Team up, customize weapons, and master portal skills as you compete for glory in epic showdowns. Narcissus Narcissus – June 5Xbox Play Anywhere Narcissus is an adrenaline-pumping, top down, action-horror game that puts you in the shoes of the last survivor on a doomed spaceship. The clock is ticking, and danger lurks around every corner. Tour de France 2025 Tour de France 2025 – June 5 The official Tour de France game goes to the next level! Thanks to the Unreal Engine 5, the roads of the Grande Boucle and other iconic races have been brought to life in a whole new way. With completely reworked landscapes and more realistic lighting effects, the Tour de France experience has never been so close to reality. Solitaire Dreamscapes Solitaire Dreamscapes – June 3 Drift away into a world of cards and dreams. It’s time to escape reality with a magical game of Solitaire! Travel through surreal landscapes and explore more than 200 levels, restoring 5 breathtaking dreamlike locations! Dozens of gameplay variations enrich the classic Solitaire formula – including obstacles, power-ups, frozen cards, locks, ribbons, seals, bonus cards, and more! Attack At Dawn: North Africa Attack at Dawn: North Africa – June 4 Attack at Dawn: North Africa is a strategy game set in WW2 North African theatre. Plan your strategy like Rommel or Montgomery and better the real history. The game will immerse you in one of the most intensive and nerve-wracking experiences of the Second World War. Bunny Cubed Bunny Cubed – June 4Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Classic block-pushing puzzles enter the third dimension with Bunny Cubed, a bright and colorful brainteasing adventure! Guide a hopping white rabbit through fields of grass and growing carrots where crates are scattered along dirt paths. Forest Golf Planner Forest Golf Planner – June 4Xbox Play Anywhere Somewhere in suburbia is an unspoiled patch of greenery, a little slice of paradise… And starting today, it’s your very own golf course! No experience in golf or business? No problem! It’s easy to get started building new fixtures and attracting your first customers. Rise through the ranks, and you’ll be able to expand your course to include new holes. Change the landscape and add unique decorations to make the course your own! Hidden Cat Outlaws Hidden Cat Outlaws – June 4 The Wild West is full of lazy, no-good-doer cats… That should be lazy and no-good-doing at safe homes instead of wooden venues or the scorching sun outside! Fill the boots of a local sheriff and spot all the wandering rascals. (And the not-so-wandering, big and mean rascals, too…) The Night of the Rabbit Daedalic Entertainment $19.99 $15.99 The Night of the Rabbit – June 4Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Lose yourself in a tale of magic and wonder, where anything is possible and where nothing is quite as it seems: Join young Jerry and follow a peculiar white rabbit to the wondrous realm of Mousewood, a land where critters can speak and where mystery abounds. Oirbo ImaginationOverflow $17.49 $14.86 Oirbo – June 4Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery A 2D action-platformer adventure that takes place on a huge spacecraft divided into interconnected areas. Search in every section for the pieces that make out the history of the journey and enhance your skills and components to get to new heights. Sumorbit Sumorbit – June 4Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Planets sumo wrestle on a variety of maps with hazards like black holes and wormholes. Complete a variety of missions from planets gaining sentience to the end of the universe. Carrier Deck Carrier Deck – June 5Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Carrier Deck is a fast-paced time management game where you will play as the Air Officer on board a CVN-76 during active war. You, alone, are responsible for all aspects of operations involving aircraft on the ship and you’ll need to work fast to ensure everything happens in time for the highest chances of warfare success. Prison Alone Prison Alone – June 5Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery A psychological horror game set in an empty prison where strange events, including disappearances, have occurred. Authorities evacuated the prisoners, but you bribed a guard to stay behind and escape. The task, however, is far from easy. Missing Banban Missing Banban – June 5Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Your friend went missing, and a dark force is looming in this already deranged world. You, Sheriff Toadster, are the only toad that can save him in this intense action-packed side-scroller adventure! Jump around, shoot your way through and investigate the mysterious disappearance, all while exploring the land and meeting the intriguing characters of this universe. Amber Alert Director's cut Amber Alert – June 5Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery Step into the shoes of a policeman in Amber Alert, a difficult survival horror game. Responding to a late-night call, you find a sinister cult of women abductors. Your mission: rescue a captive girl. Navigate perilous streets, evade cult members, and survive. AAA Dynamic Scenes AAA Dynamic Scenes – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery A richly animated collection of landscapes that transforms your screen into a remarkable window onto diverse sceneries and the passage of time. Immerse yourself in atmospheric moonlit valleys, discover energetic skeleton dances, admire futuristic metropolises bathed in neon light it. Among Ashes Dojo System $16.99 $15.29 Among Ashes – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S It’s the year 2001 and your friend has sent you a link to a game that someone posted online, but as you play you quickly realize that something is terribly wrong. There’s a dark presence in this game, and it wants to get out. As you fight nightmarish monsters and solve mind-bending puzzles, the lines between the game and the real world will fade away. Will you survive the night? Bool Capture Bool Capture – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S Trapped in a glitching program, your mission in Bool Capture is simple: clear the field of menacing red system balls. Use physics-based arcade action to hit the red balls and capture the yellow ones. The COREDROM system is recovering – can you finish before it’s too late? Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow (Xbox One) Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow – June 6 In Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow, you’re back as the smartest pup on the pasture — but this time, the farm’s gone full sci-fi! With teleporters, conveyor belts, oil slicks, and sneaky holes, you’ll need all your brainpower (and tail-wagging determination) to guide your woolly friends to safety. Cyber Love Story 17Studio LLC $14.99 $11.99 Cyber Love Story – June 6 Immerse yourself in the fascinating story of Sally White, a young girl whose life turns upside down when she finds herself embroiled in a conspiracy by a mysterious organization. Who can you trust, and who is just pretending to be a friend? Inkventure Inkventure – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery A lazy afternoon turns chaotic when a mysterious bucket sucks Gloop’s four mischievous kids into a vibrant, color-filled dimension. Now it’s up to him, a lovable slime and single dad, to jump inside, master the art of color shifting, and rescue his quirky children. SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia In The Americas SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia in The Americas – June 6Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia in the Americas is a thrilling “Find-the-Difference” game with a hidden object twist. The notorious Cheddar Mafia is spreading chaos across the Americas, and only SpotCat can stop them. Explore vibrant, hand-drawn scenes from different countries, spot the subtle differences, and stay sharp — mafia rats can appear when you least expect it.
html:
Welcome to Next Week on Xbox! In this weekly feature we cover all the games coming soon to Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Xbox PC, and Game Pass! Get more details on these upcoming games below and click their profiles for further info (release dates subject to change). Let’s jump in!

Zenless Zone Zero

Zenless Zone Zero – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S

Zenless Zone Zero is HoYoverse’s brand-new urban fantasy ARPG. Step into the shoes of a Proxy, a professional specialized in navigating the dangerous Hollows, guiding those who, for various reasons, need to venture inside. You will embark on an adventure with unique characters to explore Hollows, battle formidable enemies, complete commissions, and learn about the mysteries behind the city. Pick up the Zenless Zone Sero Starter Pack here.

Splitgate 2

Splitgate 2 – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery / Xbox Play Anywhere

Portal into the action as an elite Ace in Splitgate 2, the only free-to-play shooter where you can teleport across the map to outsmart your opponents. Team up, customize weapons, and master portal skills as you compete for glory in epic showdowns.

Narcissus

Narcissus – June 5
Xbox Play Anywhere

Narcissus is an adrenaline-pumping, top down, action-horror game that puts you in the shoes of the last survivor on a doomed spaceship. The clock is ticking, and danger lurks around every corner.

Tour de France 2025

Tour de France 2025 – June 5

The official Tour de France game goes to the next level! Thanks to the Unreal Engine 5, the roads of the Grande Boucle and other iconic races have been brought to life in a whole new way. With completely reworked landscapes and more realistic lighting effects, the Tour de France experience has never been so close to reality.

Solitaire Dreamscapes

Solitaire Dreamscapes – June 3

Drift away into a world of cards and dreams. It’s time to escape reality with a magical game of Solitaire! Travel through surreal landscapes and explore more than 200 levels, restoring 5 breathtaking dreamlike locations! Dozens of gameplay variations enrich the classic Solitaire formula – including obstacles, power-ups, frozen cards, locks, ribbons, seals, bonus cards, and more!

Attack At Dawn: North Africa

Attack at Dawn: North Africa – June 4

Attack at Dawn: North Africa is a strategy game set in WW2 North African theatre. Plan your strategy like Rommel or Montgomery and better the real history. The game will immerse you in one of the most intensive and nerve-wracking experiences of the Second World War.

Bunny Cubed

Bunny Cubed – June 4
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Classic block-pushing puzzles enter the third dimension with Bunny Cubed, a bright and colorful brainteasing adventure! Guide a hopping white rabbit through fields of grass and growing carrots where crates are scattered along dirt paths.

Forest Golf Planner

Forest Golf Planner – June 4
Xbox Play Anywhere

Somewhere in suburbia is an unspoiled patch of greenery, a little slice of paradise… And starting today, it’s your very own golf course! No experience in golf or business? No problem! It’s easy to get started building new fixtures and attracting your first customers. Rise through the ranks, and you’ll be able to expand your course to include new holes. Change the landscape and add unique decorations to make the course your own!

Hidden Cat Outlaws

Hidden Cat Outlaws – June 4

The Wild West is full of lazy, no-good-doer cats… That should be lazy and no-good-doing at safe homes instead of wooden venues or the scorching sun outside! Fill the boots of a local sheriff and spot all the wandering rascals. (And the not-so-wandering, big and mean rascals, too…)

The Night of the Rabbit

Daedalic Entertainment

$19.99 $15.99

The Night of the Rabbit – June 4
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Lose yourself in a tale of magic and wonder, where anything is possible and where nothing is quite as it seems: Join young Jerry and follow a peculiar white rabbit to the wondrous realm of Mousewood, a land where critters can speak and where mystery abounds.

Oirbo

ImaginationOverflow

$17.49 $14.86

Oirbo – June 4
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

A 2D action-platformer adventure that takes place on a huge spacecraft divided into interconnected areas. Search in every section for the pieces that make out the history of the journey and enhance your skills and components to get to new heights.

Sumorbit

Sumorbit – June 4
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Planets sumo wrestle on a variety of maps with hazards like black holes and wormholes. Complete a variety of missions from planets gaining sentience to the end of the universe.

Carrier Deck

Carrier Deck – June 5
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Carrier Deck is a fast-paced time management game where you will play as the Air Officer on board a CVN-76 during active war. You, alone, are responsible for all aspects of operations involving aircraft on the ship and you’ll need to work fast to ensure everything happens in time for the highest chances of warfare success.

Prison Alone

Prison Alone – June 5
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

A psychological horror game set in an empty prison where strange events, including disappearances, have occurred. Authorities evacuated the prisoners, but you bribed a guard to stay behind and escape. The task, however, is far from easy.

Missing Banban

Missing Banban – June 5
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Your friend went missing, and a dark force is looming in this already deranged world. You, Sheriff Toadster, are the only toad that can save him in this intense action-packed side-scroller adventure! Jump around, shoot your way through and investigate the mysterious disappearance, all while exploring the land and meeting the intriguing characters of this universe.

Amber Alert Director's cut

Amber Alert – June 5
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

Step into the shoes of a policeman in Amber Alert, a difficult survival horror game. Responding to a late-night call, you find a sinister cult of women abductors. Your mission: rescue a captive girl. Navigate perilous streets, evade cult members, and survive.

AAA Dynamic Scenes

AAA Dynamic Scenes – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

A richly animated collection of landscapes that transforms your screen into a remarkable window onto diverse sceneries and the passage of time. Immerse yourself in atmospheric moonlit valleys, discover energetic skeleton dances, admire futuristic metropolises bathed in neon light it.

Among Ashes

Dojo System

$16.99 $15.29

Among Ashes – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S

It’s the year 2001 and your friend has sent you a link to a game that someone posted online, but as you play you quickly realize that something is terribly wrong. There’s a dark presence in this game, and it wants to get out. As you fight nightmarish monsters and solve mind-bending puzzles, the lines between the game and the real world will fade away. Will you survive the night?

Bool Capture

Bool Capture – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S

Trapped in a glitching program, your mission in Bool Capture is simple: clear the field of menacing red system balls. Use physics-based arcade action to hit the red balls and capture the yellow ones. The COREDROM system is recovering – can you finish before it’s too late?

Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow (Xbox One)

Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow – June 6

In Collie Call: Farm of Tomorrow, you’re back as the smartest pup on the pasture — but this time, the farm’s gone full sci-fi! With teleporters, conveyor belts, oil slicks, and sneaky holes, you’ll need all your brainpower (and tail-wagging determination) to guide your woolly friends to safety.

Cyber Love Story

17Studio LLC

$14.99 $11.99

Cyber Love Story – June 6

Immerse yourself in the fascinating story of Sally White, a young girl whose life turns upside down when she finds herself embroiled in a conspiracy by a mysterious organization. Who can you trust, and who is just pretending to be a friend?

Inkventure

Inkventure – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

A lazy afternoon turns chaotic when a mysterious bucket sucks Gloop’s four mischievous kids into a vibrant, color-filled dimension. Now it’s up to him, a lovable slime and single dad, to jump inside, master the art of color shifting, and rescue his quirky children.

SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia In The Americas

SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia in The Americas – June 6
Optimized for Xbox Series X|S / Smart Delivery

SpotCat vs The Cheddar Mafia in the Americas is a thrilling “Find-the-Difference” game with a hidden object twist. The notorious Cheddar Mafia is spreading chaos across the Americas, and only SpotCat can stop them. Explore vibrant, hand-drawn scenes from different countries, spot the subtle differences, and stay sharp — mafia rats can appear when you least expect it.
